summary: This mod will add a player-owned non respawning chest to Harbinger\'s room in Jorrvaskr :)
descriptionHtml: Got frustrated with my tons of loot at lvl 10 and Harbinger title... thought why the heck I can\'t have safe storage in Jorrvaskr?! So did it myself. There is a key to the chest - it lies on the end table which stands in front of bed in Harbinger\'s room. The chest is non-respawning ofc ;) It\'s available from the very beginning... when I find out how to do this, I\'ll make this to available only after finishing companions questline... until then, you can either roleplay you can\'t access it or don\'t give a !!!! about it and just use the chest... ;)
author: WarlordThorvald
